entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
